title: BBM - No longer available
description:
As of May 31 2019, BBM has officially stopped operating. Though it's difficult to say goodbye, we are grateful for your support and thank you for being part of the BBM consumer service experience. As an alternative, BlackBerry is offering BBM Enterprise, its end-to-end encrypted messaging platform, to individuals for personal use.
As an alternative, BlackBerry is offering BBM Enterprise, its end-to-end encrypted messaging platform, to individuals for personal use.
